name: Paris 1871
description:
The game is only available in french

This visual novel is a school project that has been made in two months at Isart Digital.

Play a leader of the Paris Commune and face the republican army.

Platform : PC

Engine : Renpy

Number of players : 1

The team :

Game Design : Antonin Bourron, Adrien Jouannet, Tom Lacote, Rémi Leblanc.

Game Art : Axel Boulanger, Quentin Quarty, Roméo Susbielle, lucile Thyrard, Arnaud Vanderbeken

Award : Best Directing 2016 (Competing against all the other visual novels from the school that year).
